channel.title: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated
channel.description: Im new to making private servers and i followed a few tutorials that taught me how to portforward and make a no-ip account. I followed the directions, downloaded Project Insanity client and server. After launching the server and then lauchin the client, i patiently waited while it was loading. Once i tried to log on it said "Error Connection to Server". I checked the server and everything "seemed" to be ok(although i wouldnt know anyway). Do i have to compile anything or change some files so that the client will properly connect with the server? Thank you for your help!

item.title: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated
item.dc:creator: @Clawd Clawd
item.description:
@Clawd wrote:

I have a second problem guys! How do i let other people play my server? I put the client in a rar archve and uploaded it to uppit. Then when i downloaded it and ran it o my other computer, it doesntwork. The client says," Error connecting to server". Pretty much like the initial problem except on a different computer. can anyone downloadthe client and see if whats wrong?

Http://up.ht/oP5Wj9

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Clawd, post:11, topic:418939”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=521476.msg3790378#msg3790378 date=1319244961]

Thank you soo much. It workedd. I finally was able to log on! Time to edit!! I got a lot to learn

Hello world, the first program java programmers learn 

public class HelloWorld {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        System.out.println("Hello MoparScape!");//Edit me!
    }
}

Have fun!
[/quote]

THanks, but i have a question. How do i change my account to owner? i need to figure out what type of RS Server im using… it looks new. Its Project Insanity/ Hybrid PVP.(thats what it says on the client) in my character.txt file, it doesnt have anything to change that. Also, how can i make all my skills 99?[/quote]
look at a starting tutorial since your obviously new to rsps XD

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated
item.dc:creator: @mc_wobbla mc wobbla
item.description:
@mc_wobbla wrote:

[quote=“Clawd, post:6, topic:418939”]Ooo i have to change it to that? Then what do i do with my no-ip thing. I put my no-ip name in the "server = " spot.
Also, when i checked on the canyouseeme website ; it said that i didnt do it correctly. Idk i have Verizon so if anyone is familiar with portforwarding on verizon i would appreciate it if you could post a few pics or something[/quote]

the no-ip address should only be on the clients your players are using. on the client yoou’re using, you should make your ip 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.source: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated

item.title: Cannot Log on in my private server! ERROR (Help on TEAMVIEW would be appreciated
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

The problem is that the IP in the client is not set to your localhost.
Go into the Client, find client.java and press ctrl+F and search for " server = " It should look something like this

server = "ghsdjksad.no-ip.biz"

Just change the “” to your localhost.

server = "127.0.0.1"

Read full topic

also, try canyouseeme.org to see if you portforwarded correctly
